name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Firmware Engineer with over 10 years of extensive experience in designing and developing firmware solutions, particularly within secure and high-performance systems. Proficient in **C**, **C++**, and **Linux** environments, with a solid understanding of **RTOS**, **AXI**, **AHB**, **MMU**, and **DMA** protocols, ensuring robust and efficient firmware operation. Skilled in security practices such as **cryptographic signatures**, **secure boot**, **anti-rollback**, and **hardware root-of-trust**, enhancing the integrity of embedded systems. Familiar with protocols including **NVMe** and **ATA**, and adept with version control systems like **Git**. Well-versed in best practices for **FTL**, **wear-leveling**, and **garbage collection** in SSD technologies. Previous roles at prestigious organizations demonstrate a strong ability to deliver complex projects on time and within budget, leveraging both technical and collaboration skills effectively.
